page.title: 12Administration.
page.content:
The area forms part of two parliamentary constituencies.
Ingatestone is part of Brentwood and Ongar constituency currently held by the Conservatives while the area to the west of the River Wid is part of Chelmsford constituency. Chelmsford is held by the Conservatives but at the last election had only a very slender majority over the Liberals.
For the purposes of direct elections to the European parliament the whole block lies within the Essex South-west constituency and this seat is again held by a Conservative.
